record.title: RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR

speaking.paragraph: On behalf of the majority leader, I ask unanimous consent the Senate now stand in recess subject to the call of the Chair.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 2:29 p.m., recessed until 3:26 p.m., and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Ms. KLOBUCHAR).

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
